meanings: (말·충고 등을) listen (to), follow, obey, take (one's advice), (Am) mind, (formal) heed
(효과가 있다) have an effect (on), be effective, work (for), act (on)
be of a mind to listen

examples.korean: She could hear him panting up the stairs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그가 숨을 헐떡이며 계단을 올라가는[올라오는] 소리를 들을 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I could hear every word they said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그들이 하는 모든 말을 다 들을 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
